name: The Forgotten Courtyard
description:
A crumbling courtyard surrounded by grand archways, once a majestic entrance to the kingdom.
Now, it lies in ruins, overgrown with ivy and guarded by ancient stone statues.
To the north you see a grand gateway to enter the once majestic Kingdom.
To the east you see decaying grass creeping onto a stone pathway leading to something in the distance.
To the west you see a beautiful flowered archway flowing into a lush green gardenscape.

NPC.name: Bardleston
NPC.dialog:
Player: (Approaches Bardleston, the wise old bard) "Greetings, Bardleston. I seek adventure and knowledge. 
Can you guide me on my path?"  

Bardleston: "Ah, young one, the legends of Eldoria have brought you here. An ancient prophecy speaks of a hero who will reassemble the Crown of Light. Are you that hero?" 

Player: "I will do my best to fulfill the prophecy and restore harmony to the kingdom." 

Bardleston: "Good. You can start by seeking the Crystal Ball with a trapped spirit inside. It may hold the key to a new future. Find it in the depths of the abandoned tower, guarded by puzzles and spectral foes."

name: The Enchanted Ballroom
description:
An opulent ballroom frozen in time, adorned with shimmering chandeliers and exquisite d√©cor. Soft music plays from an unseen source, and faint footsteps echo.
Before you, to the north, you see an embroidered golden doorway encrested with the finest jewels and gems of the land.
To the east, you see a dark eerie hallway with dark painting covering the walls.
To the west, you see a room adorned with books on every wall, screaming with silence.
To the south, you see the courtyard that began your journey.

items.name: Royal Crown Piece
items.description: a magnificent artifact that once adorned the head of the revered rulers of the kingdom, but it's not complete.
items.usage: When all four pieces are collected and returned to the throne room, the prophecy will be complete with a new ruler at the reigns over the kingdom.

NPC.name: Crystal Ball with a Trapped Spirit
NPC.dialog:
Player: (Approaches the crystal ball, feeling an ethereal presence) "Who are you?"  

Spirit: "I am a spirit trapped within this crystal ball, longing for freedom. Only a kind and brave soul can release me. Will you be that soul?"  

Player: "I will help you find your freedom, spirit."  

Spirit: "Then you must venture to the [room] and find item that bound me. It will reveal the path to my liberation, and once freed, I shall become your steadfast companion."

name: The Cursed Well
description:
A small courtyard with a well, it has been said to grant wishes but cursed to grant at a heavy price. The water in the well reflects dark secrets.
To the west,you see the courtyard that began your journey.

items.name: Royal Seal
items.description: A regal seal marked with the symbol of the lost kingdom's royalty. It opens locked doors and bestows authority upon the bearer.
items.usage: Unlocks a mysterious door deep within the kingdom.

name: The Living Gardens
description:
An enchanted garden filled with mystical flora and fauna. The plants seem to respond to the Hero's presence, guiding their path or hindering their progress.
To the east, you see the courtyard that began your journey.

items.name: Royal Crown Piece
items.description: a magnificent artifact that once adorned the head of the revered rulers of the kingdom, but it's not complete.
items.usage: When all four pieces are collected and returned to the throne room, the prophecy will be complete with a new ruler at the reigns over the kingdom.

NPC.name: Enigma
NPC.dialog:
Player: (Encounters a mysterious figure, the Enigma) "Who are you?"  

Enigma: "Names are but shadows, and I am but a whisper in the wind. Solve my riddles, and I shall grant you hints to guide your path. Fail, and be trapped by the enigma's grasp."  

Player: "I accept the challenge. Lay your riddle before me, O enigmatic one."

name: The Throne Room
description:
The grand throne room, now deserted and draped in faded banners of the kingdom. The empty throne holds a pivotal secret.
To the east, you see a dark curtain concealing a room with what seems to have stars shining through.
To the south, you see the door way leading to the ballroom.
Behind the throne you find a concealed door.

NPC.name: Enigma
NPC.dialog:
Player: (Encounters a mysterious figure, the Enigma) "Who are you?"  

Enigma: "Names are but shadows, and I am but a whisper in the wind. Solve my riddles, and I shall grant you hints to guide your path. Fail, and be trapped by the enigma's grasp."  

Player: "I accept the challenge. Lay your riddle before me, O enigmatic one."

name: The Whispering Library
description:
A vast Library filled with dusty tomes and shelves stretching to high vaulted ceilings. Soft whispers seem to echo from the books themselves, revealing forgotten knowledge.
To the east, you see the doorway back to the ballroom.

items.name: Royal Crown Piece
items.description: a magnificent artifact that once adorned the head of the revered rulers of the kingdom, but it's not complete.
items.usage: When all four pieces are collected and returned to the throne room, the prophecy will be complete with a new ruler at the reigns over the kingdom.

NPC.name: Librarian
NPC.dialog:
Player: (Enters the library, tired and wounded) "Greetings, Librarian. I seek respite and healing."  

Librarian Ghost: "Welcome, weary seeker of knowledge. For a few gold coins, I shall provide you with the knowledge for mending your wounds and rejuvenating your spirit." 

Player: "Thank you, Librarian. Here is the gold. I appreciate your assistance."

name: The Haunted Gallery
description:
A gallery filled with portraits of the past royals, each with haunting eyes that seem to follow your every move. Whispers of betrayal and tragedy fill the air.
To the north you see a dark curtain concealing a room with what seems to have stars shining through.
To the west you see the doorway back to the ballroom.

items.name: Shadow Cloak
items.description: A cloak woven from the shadows of night. When worn, the user is rendered invisible to enemies.
items.usage: Allows the user to avoid one combat initiation.

NPC.name: Interactive Painting
NPC.dialog:
Player: (Notices a peculiar painting on the wall) "Strange, this painting seems to beckon me."  

Interactive Painting: (Spirit within the painting speaks) "I am a trapped soul, lost in this artwork. Release me, and I shall aid you on your journey."  

Player: "How can I free you from this prison?"  

Interactive Painting: "Observe the colors and patterns. Replicate the sequence, and my essence shall be freed."

name: The Starlit Observatory
description:
A domed observatory atop the Kingdoms tallest tower, revealing a breathtaking view of the night sky. Constellations and celestial bodies adorn the ceiling.
To the south you see you see a dark eerie hallway with dark painting covering the walls.
To the west, you see a room with a golden throne perfectly centered within.

items.name: Elixer of Restoration
items.description: A vial containing a glowing liquid that heals wounds and restores strength. The effects are immediate upon consumption.

name: The Timeless Clocktower
description:
A towering clock that stands in the heart of the kingdom, perpetually showing a mysterious symbol instead of the time. The clock tower holds the essence of time itself.
 You see the ladder that you climbed up to enter the tower.

items.name: Royal Crown Piece
items.description: a magnificent artifact that once adorned the head of the revered rulers of the kingdom, but it's not complete.
items.usage: When all four pieces are collected and returned to the throne room, the prophecy will be complete with a new ruler at the reigns over the kingdom.

name: The Labyrinthine Catacombs
description:
A labyrinth of dark, winding catacombs, lit only by flickering torches. It houses cryptic symbols and hidden traps, guarding the secrets of the past kings.
You see the ladder that you climbed down to enter this dark wretched place.

items.name: Ancient Amulet of Binding
items.description: A shimmering amulet said to posses the power to bind spirits and entities. It glows with a faint ethereal light.
items.usage: Allows the user to release the spirit from the crystal Ball.

NPC.name: Elder Vampire
NPC.dialog:
Player: (Confronts the menacing Elder Vampire in the final showdown) "Your reign of darkness ends here, foul creature!"  

Elder Vampire: (Laughs menacingly) "You dare challenge me, mortal? The Crown of Light will be mine once more, and Eldoria shall cower at my feet."  

Player: "Your evil ends now!" (Epic battle ensues between the player and the Elder Vampire, testing the hero's strength and resolve)
